alert.note: Alert for Ojai Valley; San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 31 at 2:07PM PST until February 01 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Beaches, San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast, Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches, Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast and Ojai Valley. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Ojai Valley; San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast
